title: A British Guide to the End of the World (2019) [video]
Hacked and Banned from Facebook
text:
My daughter was hacked some time ago, they deleted her images and contacts but she as able to recover her account.

But these hackers have clearly moved up to a whole new level of pure evil as they posted a child pornography video on my site. Of course my page was taken down and I was banned.

Now, no human to talk to. I have lodged a Police Report, seems they cant even get access to the page and the video content. Why are Facebook not lodging a police report? They are trafficking child pornography not me!!

I'm a 63 year old grandma. I could open a new account with fake ID but then how can I get my deceased parents to add me as a friend? How can I see the trips and travels I have made around the world again? And many friends I have are only Facebook and Messenger friends and that's how we chose to keep in contact without thinking the this can be taken away in an instant.

There's a button to download data but it doesn't download anything because its around 15 years to posts and pics!!

Punish the Hacker Facebook, not the victim!!
